item.title: Mystery box / Lottery ticket
item.dc:creator: @Leoiscool Leoiscool
item.description:
@Leoiscool wrote:

i have a mystery box in my server and i want it to say something when someone wins this is my code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“open”)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
if (playerHasItemAmount(6199, 1)==true)
{
deleteItem(6199, getItemSlot(6199), 1);
sendMessage(“You open the Box”);
addItem(Item2.randomlottery(), 1);
sendMessage("");
sendMessage(“you need to wait 1 minute before you can open another.”);
sendMessage(“This is the only way to get Dragon Claws.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “playerName+ has OPENED a Box.”;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “buy a mystery box at ::teampk and then do ::open only way to get claws Cost 100m”;
actionTimer = 60;
}
} else {
addItem(6587,1);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “playerName+ has Opened the Box and Got DRAGON CLAWS!”;
}

when i compile i get no errors but the problem is when i do any command u get the claws.

its the additem needs to be change but idk to what… help please?

Read full topic
